ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server)
CodeDisplay
LA26537-3No prior treatment
LA26538-1Complete response (Grade 0 - No viable cancer cells)
LA26539-9Moderate response (Grade 1 - Single cells or small groups of cancer cells)
LA26540-7Mminimal response (Grade 2 - Residual cancer outgrown by fibrosis)
LA26541-5Poor response (Grade 3 - Minimal or no tumor kill; extensive)

title.value: Set de Valores de Resultados de Observación Post Neoadyuvancia

description.value: Posibles valores para las observaciones realizadas en la evaluación post neoadyuvancia de un reporte de biopsia

display.value: Complete response (Grade 0 - No viable cancer cells)
Moderate response (Grade 1 - Single cells or small groups of cancer cells)
Mminimal response (Grade 2 - Residual cancer outgrown by fibrosis)
Poor response (Grade 3 - Minimal or no tumor kill; extensive)
